About Me

Hi, I'm Ben Tran, a passionate and driven Computer Science graduate based in Plymouth, MN. With a strong foundation in programming languages like Python, Java, and JavaScript, and hands-on experience in frameworks like Jetpack Compose and Bootstrap, I specialize in building efficient, user-friendly applications and websites.

Throughout my academic journey and project work, I've collaborated with teams to deliver impactful solutions, such as a blogging dashboard deployed on Bluehost and a real-time multiplayer application utilizing advanced threading techniques. My commitment to continuous learning and adaptability has equipped me to tackle diverse challenges and thrive in dynamic environments.

Beyond my technical skills, I value teamwork and problem-solving. Whether designing responsive user interfaces, optimizing game logic, or troubleshooting technical issues, I approach each task with precision and creativity.
